title: Uruguay: Citi Joins "Paseo Punta Carretas" to Offer Exclusive Benefits for Clients
summary: Montevideo, Uruguay - Citi Uruguay joins forces with Paseo Punta Carretas, a neighborhood discount-shopping program, to offer all Citi credit cards customers an additional 10-percent discount on purchases made with their cards.
tag-1: Uruguay: Citi Joins "Paseo Punta Carretas" to Offer Exclusive Benefits for Clients
tag-2: Montevideo, Uruguay – Citi Uruguay joins forces with Paseo Punta Carretas, a neighborhood discount-shopping program, to offer all Citi credit cards customers an additional 10-percent discount on purchases made with their cards.
tag-3: As part of an initiative of key businesses at Punta Carretas, Citi invites clients to the launch of Paseo Punta Carretas on Tuesday, August 16 at 5 p.m. at Museo Zorrilla.
tag-4: This initiative seeks to foster knowledge and history of the neighborhood, and turn it into a true leisure spot. As part of the project, all participating Paseo Punta Carretas shops will offer an 18.03-percent discount on their products on the second Thursday and Friday of each month. Citi is also joining the initiative, offering customers who make their purchases using Citi credit cards an additional 10-percent discount on specific days.
tag-5: The goal of this project is to establish a cultural and shopping district. The Paseo Punta Carretas is a promotional and cultural initiative conceived by several shops located within the neighborhood, where Citibank has a fully equipped branch strategically located in the heart of the district for the convenience of our clients.
tag-6: The discount days will begin in August; on Thursday, August 18 and Friday, August 19 customers can start enjoying the discounts at all participating shops.
tag-7: Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
